name: After The End
summary: In AFTER THE END, you will lead a group of survivors in a world devastated by a zombie apocalypse. Face resource scarcity, such as food and medicine, while dealing with the constant threat of zombie hordes and armed human enemies. Every decision can mean the difference between life and death, and permanent death means every choice has lasting consequences. With multiple playable characters, each with their own skills and stories, you must build and protect your base, manage your resources wisely, and fight to survive in a relentless environment.
